worklogs.comment:
igorcalabria commented on pull request #6758: ARROW-7960: [C++][Parquet][WIP] Add schema translation for missing logicalTypes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6758
 
 
   WIP PR for adding missing LogicalTypes listed in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7960.
   Adding direct translation to map broke the reader because there's no special case for maps. It should be straight forward to reuse the struct reader for it

emkornfield commented on pull request #6758: ARROW-7960: [C++][Parquet][WIP] Add schema translation for missing logicalTypes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6758#discussion_r399919580
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/parquet/arrow/reader_internal.cc
 ##########
 @@ -487,6 +535,8 @@ Status GroupToSchemaField(const GroupNode& node, int16_t max_def_level,
                           const SchemaField* parent, SchemaField* out) {
   if (node.logical_type()->is_list()) {
     return ListToSchemaField(node, max_def_level, max_rep_level, ctx, parent, out);
+  } else if (node.logical_type()->is_map()) {
 
 Review comment:
   It doesn't seem like this handles the backward compatibility case of "MAP_KEY_VALUE" listed in the [spec](https://github.com/apache/parquet-format/blob/master/LogicalTypes.md#maps)

emkornfield opened a new pull request #8376:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8376


   New types supported:
   - Fixed Size list (will throw an incorrect error if nulls
     are present, but this is best fixed after we recursively support
     applying types).
   - LargeList
   - Maps
   
   Still missing: LargeString and LargeBytes
   
   Unimplemented functionality:
     - Removing duplicate maps on read.
     - Single column maps are converted to List of struct.
   
   Other:
    Fixed two bugs for FixedSizeLists:
   1.  Def levels genereated were incorrect (they only made sense for
       two level lists).
   2.  Slices where not handled appropriately

fields.description: Map seems to be the most obvious one missing.  Without additional metadata I don't think FixedSizeList is possible.  LargeList would probably have to also be could be determined  empirically while parsing if there are any entries that exceed the int32 range (or with medata).  Need to also double check that struct is supported
fields.summary: [C++][Parquet] Add support for schema translation from parquet nodes back to arrow for missing types

comments.body: this won't include large binary or large string for now (I had not realized there were not implemented).
